FuncDef:
The port-queue-template command creates a port-queue template in the system view.
The undo port-queue-template command deletes a port-queue template in the system view.
By default, no port-queue profile is created in the system view.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a port-queue template.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, the question mark (?) and space not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To create a port-queue template in the system view, run the port-queue-template command. You can set scheduling parameters for eight port queues in the template. Configuring and applying a port-queue template to interfaces reduces workload of configuring port queues.
Follow-up Procedure
After the port-queue-template command is run, if the port-queue template specified by port-queue-name does not exist, the system creates a new port-queue template; if the port-queue template specified by port-queue-name exists, the system displays the port-queue template view.
Precautions
After channelized sub-interfaces are configured,LPUF-51-E/LPUI-51-E/LPUI-51-CM/LPUF-120/LPUF-120-B/LPUF-120-E/LPUI-102-E/LPUI-120/LPUI-120-B/LPUI-120-L/LPUI-52-E/LPUI-120-E/LPUI-120-CM/LPUF-240/LPUF-240-B/LPUF-240-E/LPUI-240/LPUI-240-B/LPUI-240-CM/LPUI-240-L boards do not support the queue cs6 configuration under port-queue-template.
